videoSnippet.title: 2020 Just Got A Little Bit Better || Ivanchuk vs Leko || Chess24 Legends of Chess (2020)
videoSnippet.description:
Check out Adam's video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6fu1ja2T-40 Adam

Follow me on Instagram and Twitter for extra content and notifications https://twitter.com/agadmator
https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/
 
Vassily Ivanchuk vs Peter Leko
chess24 Legends of Chess (2020), 21.7.2020, GAME 4
King's Gambit Accepted, Becker defence (C34)

1. e4 e5 2. f4 exf4 3. Nf3 h6 4. d4 g5 5. g3 fxg3 6. hxg3 Bg7 7. Nc3 d6 8. Be3 Nf6 9. Qd2 Ng4 10. Bg1 Nc6 11. O-O-O O-O 12. Nh2 Nxh2 13. Rxh2 Bg4 14. Re1 Ne7 15. Bg2 Qd7 16. Be3 Ng6 17. Reh1 c6 18. Rxh6 Bxh6 19. Rxh6 Kg7 20. Bxg5 f6 21. Be3 Rh8 22. b3 Rxh6 23. Bxh6+ Kh7 24. Bf1 Bh3 25. Be2 Re8 26. Kb2 b5 27. Bd3 Qg4 28. Be3 b4 29. Nd1 Qxg3 30. Qxb4 Bg4 31. e5 f5 32. Qxd6 Bxd1 33. Bxf5 Rg8 34. Bd2 Bg4 35. Qe7+ Rg7 36. Qg5 Qh2 37. Bxg4 Ne7 38. Qh5+ Qxh5 39. Bxh5 Rg2 40. Bb4 Nd5 41. Bf3 Rf2 42. Bxd5 cxd5 43. Bc5 a6 44. b4 Kg6 45. a4 Kf5 46. b5 axb5 47. axb5 Ke6 48. b6 Kd7 49. Kb3 Kc6 50. c4 dxc4+ 51. Kxc4 Rf4 52. e6 Re4 53. e7 Kd7 54. b7 Kc7 55. Bd6+ Kxb7 56. Be5

The chess24 Legends of Chess is the 4th stage of the $1 million Magnus Carlsen Chess Tour and features Magnus Carlsen and his predecessors as World Champion Vishy Anand and Vladimir Kramnik. It consists of two stages, a 10-player preliminary, where each player plays each other once, followed by a knockout among the top 4. Prelim ties are played as 4-game rapid matches, while knockout ties are the best of 3 such matches. The prize fund is $150,000, with $45,000 for first place, while the winner also qualifies for the $300,000 Grand Final.

The time control is 15 minutes for all moves with a 10-second increment from move 1. The winner of a preliminary tie decided in rapid games gets 3 points. If the score is 2:2 an Armageddon game is played, where White has 5 minutes to Black's 4 but a draw counts as a win for Black. A winner in Armageddon gets 2 match points, while the loser gets 1. The knockout format is the same except before Armageddon there are two 5+3 blitz games. No draw offers are allowed before move 40. Official website: chess24.com/tour
